bibl.title: Marriage Agreement with Property Division to Take Effect After Death and Other Documents.
bibl.note: Copy of a collection of five different documents brought together for a purpose which escapes us: a) a marriage agreement, dated to July 24, A.D. 109; - b) a division of property, dated to July 24, A.D. 109; - c) a registration of four slaves, dated to August 28, A.D. 105; - d) an extract from a census register incorporating descriptions of A.D. 117/18; - e) a declaration concerning four slaves who in A.D. 117/18 are on the run. Arsinoite nome.
bibl.seg: SIJPESTEIJN P.J., Marriage Agreement with Property Division to Take Effect After Death and Other Documents.
ZPE 111 (1996) pp. 163-170, 1 arbre généal. et pl. II.

Copy of a collection of five different documents brought together for a purpose which escapes us: a) a marriage agreement, dated to July 24, A.D. 109; - b) a division of property, dated to July 24, A.D. 109; - c) a registration of four slaves, dated to August 28, A.D. 105; - d) an extract from a census register incorporating descriptions of A.D. 117/18; - e) a declaration concerning four slaves who in A.D. 117/18 are on the run. Arsinoite nome.
